email.subject: Initiation
email.body:
Hello #PLAYERNAME#,
This message is to confirm a recent IRC chat, where you were offered and accepted, a position in the Revolution Hacksquad. Before you can officially begin work however, you will need to complete a trial.
Linked is a computer you will need to break into. You will have to delete a file in the home folder to complete the trial. Reply when you are done.
- RVHS Administration
